results.name: Period 3: repeat [1, 8, 9] ; Digital root of A000578(n) = n^3 for n >= 1.
comment: a(n) is the decimal expansion of 70/37. [_Enrique Pérez Herrero_, Jul 28 2009]; corrected by _David A. Corneth_, Jun 30 2016
link: Eric Weisstein's World of Mathematics, Digital Root.
Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (0,0,1).
xref: Cf. A000578, A004164, A010888, A021596. Digital roots of squares are in A056992.
results.author: _Zak Seidov_, Sep 01 2002
ext: Decimal expansion fraction corrected by _Ant King_, Apr 30 2013
Edited: name specified, offset changed from 0 to 1 (according to name), adjusted formula and g.f. for offset 1, digital root link added. - _Wolfdieter Lang_, Jan 05 2015
